abstract: The activist hedge fund Casablanca Capital says it will now support three board nominees proposed by Carl C. Icahn, the largest Mentor Graphics shareholder.
snippet: The activist hedge fund Casablanca Capital says it will now support three board nominees proposed by Carl C. Icahn, the largest Mentor Graphics shareholder.
lead_paragraph: The activist hedge fund Casablanca Capital said on Thursday that it was withdrawing its slate of nominees for the board of Mentor Graphics, instead throwing its weight behind directors proposed by Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: Casablanca Withdraws Its Slate for Mentor Graphics Board

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
